mapper.select: select id as id, project_id as projectId, project_name as projectName, stall_id as stallId, stall_name as stallName, merchant_name as merchantName, merchant_id as merchantId, user_id as userId, user_name as userName, lock_start_time as lockStartTime, lock_end_time as lockEndTime, delay as delay, delay_end_time as delayEndTime, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, status as status, stage as stage from stall_lock where is_delete = 0 and is_valid = 1
